about_the_game: You are Algernon, a nerdy mouse who has just entered the local championships in Love Rocket. A game where you command missile launchers to defend your bases against cute animal girls and their rockets. Blowing their rockets also blows away nearby clothing items, fully revealing your opponent's furry, scaly, avian or bare body in the end. You have three launchers, which sequentially load up a missile, command the launcher to fire towards a target in the air so you can chain explosions.

content_descriptors.notes: Frequent nudity, visible nipples and genitals

detailed_description: You are Algernon, a nerdy mouse who has just entered the local championships in Love Rocket. A game where you command missile launchers to defend your bases against cute animal girls and their rockets. Blowing their rockets also blows away nearby clothing items, fully revealing your opponent's furry, scaly, avian or bare body in the end. You have three launchers, which sequentially load up a missile, command the launcher to fire towards a target in the air so you can chain explosions.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Generally steam compatible linux
  • Processor: Intel i5 or equivalent
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 620
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Vulkan

name: Love Rocket Demo

  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 620
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

Recommended:

short_description: A mouse-controlled arcade game where you command missile launchers to defend your bases against cute animal girls and their rockets. Blowing their rockets also blows away their clothing.
